tool.name: Copernicus CDS Downloader for AquaINFRA marine model
tool.description: Download ERA5 data from the Copernicus Climate Data Store to provide as input to the AquaINFRA marine model. Products: ERA5 hourly data on single levels from 1940 to present, Reanalysis.

tool.help:
This tool downloads ERA5 data subsets from the **Copernicus Climate Data Store (ECMWF)** using the **CDSAPI** to provide later as input to the AquaINFRA marine model.
### Requirements
To use this tool, users must:
- Have a valid account on the Copernicus Climate Data Store: https://cds.climate.copernicus.eu - Have accepted the *Terms of Use* for the **ERA5 hourly data on single levels** dataset. This must be done manually on the dataset’s webpage (at the bottom of the download form).
### Outputs
The tool produces a ZIP file containing two NetCDF (`.nc`) files:
- `data_stream-oper_stepType-accum.nc` — accumulated variables - `data_stream-oper_stepType-instant.nc` — instantaneous variables
These files can be used as inputs for the AquaINFRA marine model tool..
